verbs.description: [V: assisted] [ARG1: suicide] runs against christian teaching i 'm responding to dan diaz recent guest column aid - in - dying law prevents long needless suffering oct 24 the emotional appeal is constant in suicide editorials columns letters etc but suicide is always self - centered because god is always omitted and the mercy of god never says to kill yourself if the polling is true when diaz says a supermajority of americans support medical aid in dying across the political and religious spectra then this religious spectra group is self - called religious because they are winging it when it comes to religion and omitting god and his word the bible from consideration concerning self - murder tell me where the bible says this type of human killing is fine with god besides being led by competent religious authority on the matter of suicide i find contrary guidance to suicide in the bible deuteronomy 32 39 learn now that i i am and there is no other god besides me suicide deuteronomy dan diaz assisted suicide
